name: Bimirror World Mirage
description:
[game]
It will be a role playing game.
[Storylines]
Two girls "Memiru" and "Ymir" live in the village.
They hear the story of another world from the old teacher Hedne and decide to return to the original world.
However, it is impossible to avoid the fight for that.
Monster and evil Empire Army wandering out of the village
"From here, the place where we cannot live... "
"But who decided that?... It's a story that doesn't work for us! "
The two girls vow to never give up their dreams and hopes, and they are going to fight.
[Fuck Scene]
Monster Sex and Tentacle Sex, Stick Attack, Wall buttocks outrageous Rape, Devil Torture, Hypnosis Training
Human Platter etc, many tortures that make beautiful bodies to tattered without mercy are waiting.
The girls continue to be tortured until the heart breaks, but still fight to give up.
By being cheated, poisoned, the experience of the insult which is carved thoroughly in the body.
Hard acts are done in the fantasy world not caught in the frame.
Does the spirit of the girls collapse?
Or do they achieve purpose?
The thought that They can never give up.
With that thought, no matter how raped, no matter how violated,
even if the stick of the tree is forced thrust in pu*sy, they can endure them.
Never lose. And then... back to the original world.
[Other]
1. This game is fiction.
2. Please refrain from playing if you are under 18 years old.
3. All of the characters appearing within the game are 18 years or over.
4. No characters under 18 years old appear within the game.
5. The stories in the game are all fiction.
6. The characters, organization, settings, and names in the game are fictitious and bear no relationship to actual ones.
